messages: fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (09:51): I like looking at airports from google earth, dont know why I have a fettish for that
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (09:55): How do you check your free virtual memory in linux?
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (09:56): mhmh it's lying to me
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (09:56): it says there is a bunch, but this make command complaints it ran out of virtual memory heh
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (09:57): euh ? when you run something, it runs out and errors ?
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (09:57): well thats because you are over committed
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (09:58): the kernel will allow the applications to request say 3Gb in total memory even when it only has 1Gb installed and 1Gb swapp
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (09:58): this is called over commit
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (09:59): well, I just restarted it
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (09:59): this is okay, because providing the application does not page fault in the other 1Gb there is no problem
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (09:59): so I could compile the logfile
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (09:59): how much mem have you got  ?  16Mb ?
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (10:01): yup and swap used from before ?
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (10:01): 0, heh, I have this tho
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (10:01): well that will be why, if you have not got any swap your server has go not where to run to when you preasure the VM
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (10:02): what is VPA server, a shared server ?  having no swap make sense, since there it would confusume non-stop IO are you all compete for memory
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (10:02): is there anyway to make it run... more memory efficient? I'm not running a huge application
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (10:02): VPS Server is a virtualized server
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (10:02): There is a host, and multiple child servers
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (10:02): each one independent of the other
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (10:03): you should look to keeping your working set down to less than 50%, which probably means after bootup you want only 25% in use
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (10:03): I guess I'll just pick up a php book and go at it
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (10:03): if you have 256Mb RAM than you want after bootup only 64Mb in use
e8f531bead4bc1e2c5512ae5f9e24339 (10:03): I got apache, mysql and postfix/courier
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (10:04): then after a bit of web serving you dont want it above 192Mb
fa71761fb227469eb1e21a890bc92117 (10:04): mysql you need to setup a thread limit maybe of only 3 threads and tunes the my.cnf mem usage for a tiny system setup
